data.prometheus.yml:
global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
scrape_configs:
- job_name: 'prometheus'
  static_configs:
  - targets: ['localhost:9090']
- job_name: 'kubernetes-pods'
  kubernetes_sd_configs:
  - role: pod
  relabel_configs:
  - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_scrape]
    action: keep
    regex: true
  - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_path]
    action: replace
    target_label: __metrics_path__
    regex: (.+)
  - source_labels: [__address__, __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_port]
    action: replace
    regex: ([^:]+)(?::\d+)?;(\d+)
    replacement: $1:$2
    target_label: __address__
  - action: labelmap
    regex: __meta_kubernetes_pod_label_(.+)
  - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_namespace]
    action: replace
    target_label: kubernetes_namespace
  - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_label_component]
    action: replace
    target_label: job
  - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_name]
    action: replace
    target_label: kubernetes_pod_name

initContainers.name: pulsar-bookkeeper-verify-clusterid

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-recovery
args:
bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/bookkeeper.conf;
OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/bookkeeper autorecovery

initContainers.name: pulsar-bookkeeper-verify-clusterid

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-bookie
args:
bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/bookkeeper.conf;
OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar bookie;

initContainers.name: wait-zookeeper-ready
wait-bookkeeper-ready

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-broker

initContainers.name: wait-zookeeper-ready
wait-broker-ready

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-proxy
args: bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/proxy.conf && echo "OK" > status && OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar proxy

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-zookeeper
args:
bin/apply-config-from-env.py conf/zookeeper.conf;
bin/generate-zookeeper-config.sh conf/zookeeper.conf; OPTS="${OPTS} -Dlog4j2.formatMsgNoLookups=true" exec bin/pulsar zookeeper;

command: echo ruok | nc -q 1 localhost 2181 | grep imok
echo ruok | nc -q 1 localhost 2181 | grep imok

containers.name: release-name-pulsar-bookie-init

initContainers.name: pulsar-bookkeeper-verify-clusterid
